1.3: Green tea flavoured with aromatic jasmine flowers.

2.3: An extra-large cup of Joja's flagship cola.

3.3: Tiny gummy slimes of assorted colours. They're sprinkled with an extremely sour powder.

5.3: Gooey, spicy cheese on top of freshly fried tortilla crisps.

7.3: Vanilla ice cream sandwiched between two chocolate biscuits.

11.3: A chewy sweet with an intense, pungent flavour.

12.3: A star-shaped shortbread biscuit with rainbow sprinkles.

13.3: It's a big, hard sweet that lasts the whole film!

16.3: It's loaded with vitamins and fibre.

20.3: A small chocolate cake glazed with a cappuccino mousse.

22.3: A single drop of stardrop essence transforms this sorbet into an extraordinary treat.

23.3: Flavoured sugar crystals attached to a convenient stick.
